document.full_text: a party official is demanding e-mails from william cronon, a history professor at the university of wisconsin who wrote about the conservative underpinnings of the public-unions battle.
document.title: wisconsin professor's e-mails are target of g.o.p. records request
lines_and_colors: a party official is demanding e-mails from william cronon, a history professor at the university of wisconsin who wrote about the conservative underpinnings of the public-unions battle.
